notes.player: A weapon produced only by special commission by the artisan-masters of Cadence from the Calixis Sector, the Destroyer is a highly advanced pattern of hand flamer that uses force-compression technology similar to that of plasma weaponry to create a superheated thermal-incandescent blat that burns far hotter and with greater fuel efficiency than that of a usual flamer. If the stories are to be believed, the first commissioner of this weapon none other than a Legendary Ordo Xenos Inquisitor named Ark-Ashten, and this legend has led to a greater belief of its abilities.
